data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 6444, Version Hash: cd8708231e3e29807f70ec077b27598a4df9013e
data.actual_result: I continue to stay "keyed up" and people can still hear me speaking.
data.expected_result: My PTT should "deactivate" (I should stop being "keyed up"/speaking).
data.short_description: When I am using PTT bound to a numpad key, and hold down shift, then let go of the PTT button, I continue to speak.
data.steps_to_repro: - Use a key on your numpad (num 3). - Press down on the PTT key. - Hold down shift. - Let go of PTT key while still holding shift.
